short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge Your NetSuite Experience with SuiteGuru Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge Your NetSuite Experience with SuiteGuru Extension!

Elevate your productivity with SuiteGuru, the essential Chrome extension for every NetSuite admin and developer. Featuring a sleek, intuitive interface and a customizable dashboard, SuiteGuru provides powerful tools to optimize your workflow:

⦾ Dashboard Insights: Get real-time visuals of script deployments and execution logs.
⦾ Record JSON Viewer: Easily convert any NetSuite record into a JSON object for advanced insights.
⦾ Configuration Audit: Compare NetSuite feature configurations across accounts effortlessly.
⦾ Enhanced Scripting: Instantly access all 2.x API modules in your browser console with the "guru" variable.
⦾ Tailored Interface: Customize your dashboard and side menu to highlight the information you need.
⦾ Comprehensive Monitoring: Track scripts, workflows, and server statuses directly affecting your records.
⦾ Efficient Search: Quickly locate transactions, entities, items, or scripts by document number or internal ID.
⦾ Direct Record Links: Speed up navigation with quick links to NetSuite’s Record Browser.

 Download SuiteGuru today and transform the way you manage and develop within NetSuite!
